casebody.data:
ANR PIPELINE COMPANY v. LOUISIANA TAX COMMISSION, Malcolm B. Price, Jr., Chairman of the Louisiana Tax Commission, Kenneth P. Naquin, Jr., Member of the Louisiana Tax Commission, and Russell R. Gaspard, Member of the Louisiana Tax Commission

And All Other Consolidated Cases.

No. 2009-C-0027. Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2009.

In re ANR Pipeline Company; Southern Natural Gas Company; Tennessee Gas Pipeline Company; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. F, No. 468-M17; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2008-CA-1148 through 2008-CA-1162.

Denied.

WEIMER, J., recused.
